title: cannot using hextech crafting to re-roll new champion
body:
Is there any timeline that allows you using hextech crafting champions loot to re-roll and gets the new champion, in this case - Taliyah.
I have all champions but cannot get Taliyah, eventhough it says 3 items = 1 that you do not own
Thx

replies.body: Hey usually you need to give it a bit of time before a new champion is added into hextech crafting. If you have rerolled 3 and didnt get taliyah please contact player support and they will fix that up for you!
I managed to do it like an hour after her release.
